summary: A comprehensive test suite for the internal components of the Certbot Nginx plugin, covering configurator logic, display interactions, HTTP‑01 challenge handling, configuration parsing, address/virtual‑host objects, and supporting utilities.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of the Nginx integration used by Certbot to automate SSL/TLS certificate issuance and renewal, ensuring correct behavior across server configuration, challenge response, and user interaction scenarios.
